backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing admin access control, user profiles, and full CRUD operations for property records with blob storage support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across components, hooks, pages, and layout.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Incomplete deployment retry guide outlining prerequisites and the start of a clean-state procedure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring fonts, favicon, and bootstrap container for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router with main page routes wrapped in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin UI for granting and revoking admin access via principal IDs with form handling and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminStatus: Always-visible badge showing the user's admin status with a manual refresh button.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Displays instructions for obtaining admin access and shows the user's principal with copy support when they are not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: A login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Shows the authenticated user's principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Displays business name, address, and phone info using icons and styled components.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with marketing text, an image, contact options, and an auth button.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: A client-side inquiry form with validation, mock submission, and success/error states.
Renders a list of inquiries with name, email, property interest, and message details.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Displays quick-access contact and social media buttons in default or compact mode.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing business info, contact details, hours, and a credits section.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with links, business branding, admin visibility logic, and compact contact bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides a form for creating or editing a property with image and video upload support.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video handling, and admin edit/delete controls.
Modal for adding or editing property details, including images and text fields.
Image gallery component with navigation and error handling for property images.
Renders a grid of PropertyCard components, with empty-state messaging and admin actions.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Contains static property interface, business info, social links, and seeded property data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics and environment info using react-query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides grant and revoke admin mutations with error normalization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads and exposes a direct video URL for playback with basic loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Uploads a video file as an ExternalBlob with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Returns an empty inquiry list placeholder since backend inquiry support was removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login flow, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Synchronizes a React state value with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Handles property listing queries and create/update/delete mutations through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Checks if the current caller is an admin, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard that handles authentication, admin checks, diagnostics, inquiries, and admin management UI states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, business highlights, and an inquiry contact section.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Page displaying a simple inquiry submission form with title and description.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Property listing and management page supporting create, update, delete, and admin‑gated editing.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how site content and property data can be exported or ported to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines basic frontend-only types for user profiles and inquiries.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Utility for determining video type (YouTube, uploaded blob, or none).
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with size and type validation.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes Internet Computer errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across routing and sessions.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts video files to data URLs without size limits.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Provides functions to extract a YouTube video ID from multiple URL formats and generate corresponding embed URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project's state including architecture notes, known issues, existing features, and new feature requests for admin management and deployment fixes.
